thread.title: 13 Galentine’s Day gifts for the friend who’s not afraid to speak their mind
thread.title_full: 13 Galentine’s Day gifts for the friend who’s not afraid to speak their mind

author: Eva Recinos
title: 13 Galentine’s Day gifts for the friend who’s not afraid to speak their mind
text:
13 Galentine’s Day gifts for the friend who’s not afraid to speak their mind We get it: Valentine’s Day can be a great day to show your significant other just ~how much~ you love them. We all need reminders now and then. But we should also send some love to the people who have our backs (even before bae showed up). That’s exactly why we are totally here for the totally here for the Galentine’s Day celebrations that remind us why we love our BFFs so much.
With so many many ways to celebrate , we almost wish Galentine’s Day would happen more than once a year. To make the most out of the day, consider surprising your frond ’til the ond with with an awesome gift . Specifically, this gift guide is for the BFF who tells you things straight-up (no, that dress doesn’t look so good), defends you from the haters (by ), and spews enough sarcasm for the both of you (which is why you love them).
1. This amazing Beyoncé-inspired shirt. theRMCOshop / www.etsy.com Buy here for $18. 
2. A pin with wise words that never get old. ban.do / ban.do Buy it here for $10. 
3. This sassy girl power tee. Bella Doña / shop.shop.bella-dona.com Buy it here for $34. 
4. A mug that says it all. Ohh Deer / ohhdeer.com Buy it here for $15. 
5. A phone case with a clear message. Society6 / society6.com Buy it here for $28. 
6. This patch that proves you’re not here for body shaming. Sara M. Lyons / saramlyons.myshopify.com Buy it here for $6. 

7. A sassy candle that says it all. EttaArlene / www.etsy.com Buy it here for $8.99. 
8. A tote bag after our own hearts. Emily McDowell / emilymcdowell.com Buy it here for $20. 
9. This super cute phone case that also keeps it real. Valfre / valfre.com Buy it here for $38. 
10. This super relevant sweater. Wicked Clothes / www.wickedclothes.com Buy it here for $35. 
11. An embroidery hoop that is nothing but honest. milkyteea / www.etsy.com Buy it here for $19.28. 
12. A pin that says it all. ModernGirlBlitz / www.etsy.com Buy it here for $2. 
13. This pillow for the die-hard wino. Society6 / society6.com Buy it here for $20. 
And just remember: You’re our Galentines — all day, every day.
